LanguageData.BetterPacifists.FistsNonLethal.Tooltip: Fists count as a non-lethal weapon. They may still provide the negative thoughts if they deal damage above threshold, cause permanent injury, or are used against a downed pawn.
LanguageData.BetterPacifists.UseMaxDamageForNonLethal: Use damage threshold for non-lethal weapons
If enabled, using non-lethal weapons can still count as hurting others if they do above the specified damage.
LanguageData.BetterPacifists.MaxDamageForNonLethal.To: If a weapon marked as non-lethal deals more damage than the value specified here, it will count as actually hurting the pawn.
